languages.text: "Ты не представляешь, какую опасность несешь, живя вне закона Империума. Ты играешь с огнем, и однажды поплатишься за каждый свершенный самосуд".
"You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."
languages.original_text: "Ты не представляешь, какую опасность несешь, живя вне закона Империума. Ты играешь с огнем, и однажды поплатишься за каждый свершенный самосуд".

traits.locale_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."
"You do not realise the dangers of living outside the law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."
"You do not realise the dangers of living outside the law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."
"You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."
"You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."
"You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."

languages.text: 「お前は、帝国の法の外に生きることの危険さを分かっていない。火遊びをしているようなものだ。いつかその場当たりの私刑のすべてに、代償を払う日が来るぞ」
languages.original_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、法の外に生きることの危険さを分かっていない。火遊びをしているようなものだ。いつかその場当たりの私刑のすべてに、代償を払う日が来るぞ」
「お前は、法の外に生きることの危険さを分かっていない。火遊びをしているようなものだ。いつかその場当たりの私刑のすべてに、代償を払う日が来るぞ」

languages.text: "Ihr erkennt nicht, wie gefährlich es ist, außerhalb des Imperialen Gesetzes zu leben. Ihr spielt mit dem Feuer, und eines Tages werdet Ihr für jeden Akt der Lynchjustiz bezahlen, den Ihr begangen habt."
languages.original_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr erkennt nicht, wie gefährlich es ist, außerhalb des Imperialen Gesetzes zu leben. Ihr spielt mit dem Feuer, und eines Tages werdet Ihr für jeden Akt der Lynchjustiz bezahlen, den Ihr begangen habt."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas conscience des dangers auxquels vous vous exposez en vivant en dehors de la loi. Vous jouez avec le feu et finirez tôt ou tard par payer pour toutes les fois où vous avez cru bon de rendre justice vous-même. »
languages.original_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas conscience des dangers auxquels vous vous exposez en vivant en dehors de la loi. Vous jouez avec le feu et finirez tôt ou tard par payer pour toutes les fois où vous avez cru bon de rendre justice vous-même. »

« Vous n'avez pas conscience des dangers auxquels vous vous exposez en vivant en dehors de la loi. Vous jouez avec le feu et finirez tôt ou tard par payer pour toutes les fois où vous avez cru bon de rendre justice vous-même. »

languages.text: «No se da cuenta de lo peligroso que es vivir fuera de la ley imperial. Está jugando con fuego, y algún día pagará por todas las veces que se ha tomado la justicia por su mano».
languages.original_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."

traits.locale_text: «No se da cuenta de lo peligroso que es vivir fuera de la ley imperial. Está jugando con fuego, y algún día pagará por todas las veces que se ha tomado la justicia por su mano».

languages.text: “你完全意识不到违法乱纪的危险。你这是在玩火自焚，总有一天，你会为你这种暴民正义的行为付出代价。”
languages.original_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."

traits.locale_text: “你完全意识不到违法乱纪的危险。你这是在玩火自焚，总有一天，你会为你这种暴民正义的行为付出代价。”
“你完全意识不到违法乱纪的危险。你这是在玩火自焚，总有一天，你会为你这种暴民正义的行为付出代价。”

languages.text: "İmparatorluk Yasası'ndan yoksunluğun tehlikelerinden bihabersin. Ateşle oynuyorsun. Gün gelecek, güruh adaleti adına işlediğin suçların bedelini ödeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk Yasası'ndan yoksunluğun tehlikelerinden bihabersin. Ateşle oynuyorsun. Gün gelecek, güruh adaleti adına işlediğin suçların bedelini ödeyeceksin."
"Kanunsuzluğun tehlikelerinden bihabersin. Ateşle oynuyorsun. Gün gelecek, güruh adaleti adına işlediğin suçların bedelini ödeyeceksin."

languages.original_text: "You do not realise the dangers of living outside the Imperial Law. You are playing with fire, and one day you will pay for every act of mob justice you have committed."
